notes: AMD XDNA 1.1 NPU in Ryzen 8040 series (Hawk Point). 16 TOPS INT8 peak. 20 AIE-ML tiles based on Xilinx Versal AI Engine architecture. Dedicated silicon for AI inference, separate from CPU/GPU. Supports ONNX via DirectML/Windows ML. Used for Windows Studio Effects, background AI tasks.
